title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, …) behind a simple REST/CLI API; ships macOS/Linux binaries and Docker images.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official TypeScript/JavaScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers via fetch.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client; sync & async generators, Pydantic models, PyPI package.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI (like ChatGPT) that proxies to a local Ollama instance; Docker one-liner.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with Ollama.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced CLI wrapper around Ollama with prompts and utilities.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing Ollama models into the editor as a GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose examples for Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and autoscaling.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repository for building RAG apps with Ollama and Chroma.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets users chat with Ollama models in servers.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama with streaming replies.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service exposing Ollama with OpenAI-compatible endpoints.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision Ollama on AWS EC2 with GPU.

title: ollama-macos-swift
summary: SwiftUI Mac app that wraps Ollama for native UI interactions.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama; includes derive macros for chat messages.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter that turns any Ollama model into a LangChain LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG example using llama.cpp embeddings and Ollama for generation; shows chunking + vector search.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based TUI client for Ollama with conversation history, syntax highlighting and themes.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot calls to a local Ollama model; zero-config override.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration package letting pipelines use Ollama models for query answering & generation.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official stack templates: Ollama + GPU support, Open-WebUI, nginx, and Prometheus monitoring.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library used internally by Ollama CLI; exposes chat, pull, create, delete APIs.

title: ollama-npm
summary: npm landing for the official ollama-js package; 50k+ weekly downloads, zero dependencies.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: PyPI page for official ollama-python; 100k+ monthly downloads, supports 3.8+.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for model recommendations, troubleshooting and showcase projects (15k members).

title: ollama-hackernews-discussion
summary: Hacker News thread discussing Ollama’s move to Apache 2.0 and new embedding endpoint.

title: ollama-youtube-tutorial
summary: YouTube walkthrough: install Ollama, pull Llama 3, add custom Modelfile, and integrate with Obsidian.

title: ollama-blog-rag
summary: Official blog post explaining how to build a RAG pipeline using Ollama embeddings and LangChain.
